channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200; NGFW Module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200; NGFW Module

item.title: CVE-2017-17330|2024-08-05T20:51:31.072Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ar3200%3B%20ngfw%20module
item.description: Huawei AR3200 V200R005C32; V200R006C10; V200R006C11; V200R007C00; V200R007C01; V200R007C02; V200R008C00; V200R008C10; V200R008C20; V200R008C30; NGFW Module V500R001C00; V500R001C20; V500R002C00 have a memory leak vulnerability. The software does not release allocated memory properly when parse XML element data. An authenticated attacker could upload a crafted XML file, successful exploit could cause the system service abnormal since run out of memory.
